players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I'm innocent, I didn't kill Alice. I was in my room all night."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and found evidence. We should lynch him."
Diana: "Bob, I don't think Charlie's evidence is reliable. We should wait for more information before making a decision."
